attributes.action: Lets tell the government to put pressure on countries to abolish the death penalty
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that no human being should have their life taken away simply because they have commited mistakes in the past. This is a cruel act to do to somebody as everybody deserves a second chance. Taking somebodies life willingly is still seen as murder. Nobody has the authority or right to do so.
Please support us to raise awareness to make sure that every country has abolished this revolting law.
